imdb.title: Hitorijime My Hero
imdb.plot: High schooler Masahiro Setagawa is a fairly helpless delinquent, so much so that the neighborhood bullies use him to run their errands. His life changes when he meets high school teacher Kosuke Oshiba.

episodes.title: In the Beginning, He Wouldn't Tell Me Anything
episodes.plot: High schooler Masahiro Setagawa has been jaded by life and is a helpless delinquent, but everything changes when he meets his teacher, Kosuke Oshiba.

episodes.title: The Days Go On, But There's More
episodes.plot: Kensuke and Setagawa are having their own respective freak outs about certain people coming back into their lives. What will they do when they can't ignore them?

episodes.title: Like a Teeny, Tiny Ray of Light
episodes.plot: Kensuke, still reeling from his last encounter, sees a girl dropping Hasekura off at school. Meanwhile, Hasekura thinks of a different way to mend his ties with Kensuke.

episodes.title: A Hunch, Hidden by Fragrant Smoke
episodes.plot: Kensuke has become comfortable with his feelings for Hasekura, and is happy with their relationship. Meanwhile, Setagawa has to confront some truths about his own feelings.

episodes.title: A Person Worthy of Love
episodes.plot: Setagawa can't seem to wrap his head around what happened last time with Kousuke. With his feelings in revolt, Setagawa looks to the past.

episodes.title: My Savior, Be Free
episodes.plot: After meeting up with his old gang, Setagawa decides to become their lap dog again to save Kousuke. Because of this, he starts the distance himself from Ken and the others making everyone worried.

episodes.title: The High School Boys Howl
episodes.plot: Setagawa continues his isolation until Kousuke, determined, tries to understand why he's isolating himself from his friends.

episodes.title: Inextinguishable Emotions Push Me Forward
episodes.plot: Setagawa finally seems to be accepting his feelings for Kosuke. Kensuke seems more than supportive about his friends' new relationship.

episodes.title: Where My Feelings Are Headed
episodes.plot: As Setagawa gets used to his feelings for Kosuke he learns how to balance his needs in a relationship and of his partner's.

episodes.title: Why Is It So Hard To Be Happy?
episodes.plot: Trouble brews when Setagawa's friend brings up a little detail about his relationship with Kousuke. With anxiety biting at his heels he tries to get reassurance from Kousuke.

episodes.title: That's Why I Just Want You to Smile
episodes.plot: Kousuke is worried after he is suddenly summoned in to the Principal's office. Has Kousuke and Setagawa's relationship been found out?

episodes.title: The Kindest Place In The World
episodes.plot: Setagawa tries to separate himself from Kousuke but will the separation prove to be too much for them? Will Setagawa finally accept his place in Kousuke's life?
